member.summary: Optional Text that should appear within the attachment

member.name: P:Cake.Slack.Chat.SlackChatMessageAttachment.Mrkdwn_In
member.summary: Collection of fields that use Slack's Markdown-like message formatting. Valid values are "pretext", "text", and "fields".
member.value: Which fields use Slack's Markdown-like message formatting.

member.name: T:Cake.Slack.Chat.SlackChatProvider
member.summary: Contains Slack API Chat functionality.

member.name: M:Cake.Slack.Chat.SlackChatProvider.PostMessage(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Post message to Slack Channel
member.param: SlackProvider auth token
Channel to send message to. Can be a public channel, private group or IM channel. Can be an encoded ID, or a name.
Text of the message to send. For message formatting see Formatting | Slack

member.name: M:Cake.Slack.Chat.SlackChatProvider.PostMessage(System.String,System.String,Cake.Slack.Chat.SlackChatMessageSettings)
member.summary: Post message to Slack Channel
member.param: Channel to send message to. Can be a public channel, private group or IM channel. Can be an encoded ID, or a name.
Text of the message to send. For message formatting see Formatting | Slack
Lets you override default settings like UserName, IconUrl or if it should ThrowOnFail
